description: Volume of (the dilation by 2) of the Relaxed Boolean Quadric polytope of order n.
references: C.-W. Ko, J. Lee and E. Steingrimsson: The Volume of Relaxed Boolean-Quadric and Cut Polytopes, Discrete Mathematics, 163 (1997), 293-298.
author: Einar Steingrimsson (einar(AT)math.chalmers.se)
